edu.uidaho.junicon.grammars.common

Class LineContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uidaho.junicon.grammars.common.LineContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILineContext

    public class LineContext
extends Object
implements ILineContext
    Location in source file for text undergoing parsing and evaluation. The text can originate from multiple sources, so the context is broken up into segments that span the lines of text. Files can also be included from other files, so provision is made to record the include history in chains of contexts. For simplicity, we assume each line of text to be from a single source, so only line numbers and not column numbers are provided.

      • LineContext

        public LineContext(ILineContext context,
                   String text,
                   int offset)
        Constructor that derives line number from given context and offset. Ignores offset if < 0 or context is null or its line < 0.

      • setLineFromContext

        public void setLineFromContext(ILineContext context,
                               int lineOffset)
        Description copied from interface: ILineContext
        Sets line number by adding offset to given context's line number. If context is null uses offset, otherwise adds offset to its beginning line number.
        Specified by:
        setLineFromContext in interface ILineContext
        lineOffset - offset of text in context, if < 0 is set to 0.

      • addSegment

        public ILineContext addSegment(ILineContext from,
                               String text,
                               int lineOffset)
        Description copied from interface: ILineContext
        Adds a segment created by copying from the given context. Does not add segment if text is null or empty.
        Specified by:
        addSegment in interface ILineContext
        Parameters:
        from - segment context
        text - segment text
        lineOffset - offset of the segment in the parent text, if < 0 is set to 0.
        Returns:
        added segment, or null if text is null or empty.

      • addSegmentsFrom

        public void addSegmentsFrom(ILineContext from,
                            int lineOffset)
        Description copied from interface: ILineContext
        Adds segments from the given context. Performs a shallow copy of any segment references. Added segments have their lineOffsets adjusted by given lineOffset, which is thus destructive on the original context.
        Specified by:
        addSegmentsFrom in interface ILineContext

      • follows

        public boolean follows(ILineContext context)
        Description copied from interface: ILineContext
        Returns if this context follows the given context. This context follows the given context if it is null, it is the the same as this, its linenumber is equal to this, or its linenumber is 1 less than this.
        Specified by:
        follows in interface ILineContext
